original_text: When the priests finished offering the sacrifices, the king and everyone with him bent down low to worship God.
korean_text: 제사 드리기를 마치매 왕과 그와 함께 있는 자들이 다 엎드려 경배하니라

sentences.original_text: When the priests finished offering the sacrifices
the king and everyone with him
bent down low to worship God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님을 경배하기 위해 몸을 깊이 숙였다
